techmeme.title: OpenAI hires Instacart CEO Fidji Simo as CEO of Applications, reporting to Sam Altman, who says he'll stay CEO focusing "on research, compute, and safety" (Sam Altman/@sama)
In prepared Senate testimony, Microsoft and others urge US lawmakers to streamline federal AI energy permits and open government data sets for AI training (David Shepardson/Reuters)
Latin American e-commerce and fintech giant MercadoLibre reports Q1 revenue up 37% YoY to $5.9B, $494M in net income, and Argentina revenue up 125% YoY to $1.3B (Daniel Cancel/Bloomberg)
Nebius Group's Toloka, which uses human experts to train and evaluate AI models and has worked with Amazon and Anthropic, raised $72M led by Bezos Expeditions (Alexander Marrow/Reuters)
Eddy Cue's disclosure of Apple's plan to shift its browser to AI systems had a clear goal of downplaying the importance of Apple's search deal with Google (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
